page.title: 01LANDSCAPE REVIEW:FLEET AREA
page.content: MOST OF{FLEET}IS{FARMLAND}AND CROPS SUCH AS WHEAT,CORN AND GRASS ARE GROWN THERE.THERE ARE TWO CHURCHES,ONE VERY SMALL THE OTHER QUITE BIG.YOU CAN WALK ALONG THE SHORE WHICH IS A{NATURE} RESERVE.IF YOU KEEP WALKING ALONG BY THE WATER YOU COME TO{MOONFLEET HOTEL} WHICH HAS A SWIMMING POOL,SQUASH COURT ,TENNIS COURT,ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND AND GAMES ROOM.{HERBURY}WHICH IS ON THE VERY EDGE OF{FLEET}PAST{MOONFLEET {HOTEL}WAS YEARS AGO CALLED DONKEY {ISLAND.}THE{FLEET}WATER IS NOT SUITABLE FOR BATHING BECAUSE IT HAS AN UNDERCURRENT,YOU COULD GET CARRIED OUT.THE FISHERMEN STILL FISH FOR{ {MACKEREL}OUT IN THE ROWING BOATS.THERE ARE TWO CAMPSITES NEAR{MOONFLEET HOTEL AND AROUND THE CAMP SITE THERE ARE LOTS OF FIELDS AND AN OUTSIDE SWIMMING POOL.
